content: this text is about a legal case that was brought before the supreme court of rs the court determined the amount of money that needed to be paid in the cost procedure in the first instance judgment the court reviewed the data and made a decision the supreme court awarded compensation to one of the parties involved in the case the dispute is about specific data related to goods and the division of ownership is 51 for the plaintiff and 49 for the defendant the supreme court dismissed an application for revision in a court appeal case the decision states that the application for revision has been dismissed because the core conditions required by the civil procedure act were not met the court of second instance confirmed the previous decision the applicant is seeking leave to appeal a judgment made by the court of first instance claiming errors in determining the amount of contribution to the matrimonial property the applicant believes that the lower courts made mistakes in assessing the contributions to the coowned property and that the judgment does not meet the standard of reasoning required by the law the supreme court dismissed the applicants application

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 429/2014, 2. 4. 2015
